original: Jonsson, Verner Alfred, kontorschef, Göteborg, f. 5/7/05 i Stblm av Sven Alfred J. o. Fanny Elvira Heijden-berg. G. 31 m. Mary Agda Margit Violetta Engfeldt. — Realex. v. norra latin i Sthlm. Anst. v. AEG i Sthlm 22-27, v. AEG i Berlin 27-35, v. AEG Dansk Elektr. A/S i Köpenhamn 35-42, kont :chef i AEG i Gbg sed. 42.
translated: Jonsson, Verner Alfred, office manager, Gothenburg, born on July 5th, 1905 in Stockholm to Sven Alfred J. and Fanny Elvira Heijden-berg. Married on March 31st to Mary Agda Margit Violetta Engfeldt. Graduated from Norra Latin High School in Stockholm. Worked for AEG in Stockholm from 1922-1927, AEG in Berlin from 1927-1935, and AEG Dansk Elektr. A/S in Copenhagen from 1935-1942. Became office manager at AEG in Gothenburg in 1942.
